name: Harland

topics.response_text: You did good, smoothskin. Never thought I'd get out of that room.
I see. Spare me the details. Goddamn. She had the yellowest smile...

topics.topic_text: How can I help get you out of this room?
topics.response_text: Ha! Well, you're polite, I'll give you that. If this was just between you and me, I'd do as you ask. But it's not.

topics.topic_text: Looks like I have to kill you.
topics.response_text: Then you're dumber than you look, smoothskin. Eat this!
I see. Well, spare me the details.

topics.topic_text: How did you end up trapped down here?
topics.response_text: First off, I'm not trapped. This was a tactical choice, all right?

topics.topic_text: I'll try to find your friend.
topics.response_text: Thanks. Let me know what you find out. Here's hoping she's okay.

topics.topic_text: You don't look like the other ghouls from Bright's group.
topics.response_text: Guess the outfit gives that away, huh? I never did buy into that religious mumbo-jumbo with the robes and all that shit.

topics.topic: HarlandNightkinInfoWhat can you tell me about the "demons"?
topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the creatures out there?
topics.response_text: I kill them on sight, so we haven't had much time to get acquainted.
I'm not expecting good news, but keep looking.

topics.topic_text: Chris said you might know where I can find computer parts.
topics.response_text: He did, did he? I swear, I should tear the rest of the hair out of that cocksucker's head.

topics.topic_text: What "folks" were you escorting to work?
topics.response_text: Oh, you haven't run across Bright's little cult upstairs, eh?

topics.topic_text: Where did you say I might find some computer parts again?
topics.response_text: And I thought I was old. It's a junkshop east and slightly north of here. There's an old woman running it. Gilbert, or something.

topics.topic: HarlandWhyPCisHerePC says what he's doing here.
topics.topic_text: Jason sent me down here to get rid of the "demons."
topics.response_text: And I bet he told you it's the creator's will for you to risk your ass, instead of him, right?

description:
Harland is a 85 year-old Human Male.

A pragmatic ghoul who joined the Bright Brotherhood not for its ideals, but for companionship and resources. As a sharpshooter, he serves as muscle for the group while avoiding their robes and beliefs. Currently trapped in a barricaded supply room at the REPCONN Test Site, where he has created a defensive position against nightkin intruders.

Harland's Personality: Pragmatic and self-interested with clearly defined moral boundaries. Harland values companionship and material rewards but refuses to risk his life for causes he doesn't believe in. He's resourceful under pressure and willing to take extreme measures to protect himself when cornered.

Harland's Backstory: Harland was once an ordinary human before becoming a ghoul sometime before the events of 2281. He eventually joined the Bright Brotherhood, drawn by the presence of female ghouls rather than their spiritual leader's teachings. When the Brotherhood's mission at the REPCONN Test Site went awry, Harland found himself trapped in an isolated supply room with nightkin seeking the Stealth Boys within. Rather than surrender, he fortified his position, turning the room into a deadly kill zone with traps and weapons.
